# Materials and Methods

## Field sampling

```{r}
library(leaflet)

samples <- data.frame(
  lat = c(37.8320, 36.5479),
  lng = c(-5.0369, -4.6152),
  popup = c("La Breña Reservoir", "Los Boliches Beach")
)

leaflet(samples) |> 
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery") |> 
  addMarkers(~lng, ~lat, popup = ~popup) |> 
  setView(lat = 37, lng = -5, zoom = 6) |>
  addMiniMap() |> 
  addScaleBar()
```
